description:
You've got to be the very best, like
no one ever was - and the only way
to do that is by catching all the
Pokémon you can!


Your quest to catch 'em all and
complete your Pokédex will take you
all over the world, and maybe one
day you'll even be able to defeat all
the Gym Leaders and collect their
badges!
name: Pokémon™ Edición Azul
